Description: 2ft by 4ft lighting fixture recessed in a suspended ceiling.  Fragility is for casualty evaluation only.  Ceiling lighting cost consequence has been included in the suspended ceiling fragilities.
Name: Recessed lighting in suspended ceiling - with independent support wires
Author: Not Given
Notes:
This component requires user specified cost and time consequence data.  Values within PACT are defaults (equal to zero) and do not represent actual consequence.
